h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)
content: There's another Yaksha Patroller here waiting to challenge you, so try and isolate him first by luring the corpses down the stairs and then take him out. Once again, there's another green Wisp to absorb on the right to get some gourd healing back.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snowhill_Path_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Snowhill Path Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Frost-Clad Path' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)'.
The content is as follows:
There's another Yaksha Patroller here waiting to challenge you, so try and isolate him first by luring the corpses down the stairs and then take him out. Once again, there's another green Wisp to absorb on the right to get some gourd healing back.
